items.sentence: Tom waited patiently for three hours, then left.
I don\'t think I\'m the only one who\'s worried.
Tom doesn\'t remember the last time he saw Mary.
Tom got blamed even though it wasn\'t his fault.
Tom certainly isn\'t the genius he thinks he is.
Tom didn\'t have any reason not to believe Mary.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was back from Boston.
Tom didn\'t know what to do with the extra food.
I told Tom that I didn\'t know where Mary lived.
I told Tom that he shouldn\'t go out after dark.
The children watched TV while Tom cooked dinner.
The only free seat left was the one next to Tom.
Tom always carries a map and compass in his bag.
Tom and I have known each other for a long time.
I expect him to take care of my younger brother.
I find it difficult to express myself in French.
I get nervous whenever I go through immigration.
I had to study French when I was in high school.
This has nothing to do with why Tom isn\'t here.
The bus driver and three passengers were killed.
